resources.string:
प्रोजैक्ट टीम

 प्रोजैक्ट मार्गदर्शक:

 डॉ एस एल पाटिल

 विभाग प्रमुख
 उपकरण और नियंत्रण विभाग
 इंजीनियरिंग महाविद्यालय पुणे


 हार्डवेयर और सॉफ्टवेयर समर्थन:
 हर्षल दलाल

 टीम समर्थन:

 हार्दिक परमार
 प्रशिता चौहान
 मलय सोनी
 विशाल कुंभकर्ण
 बोधिसत्य सरकार

 समर्थन:

 दीपक कुमार सिंह
 सिद्धार्थ घुले
मल्टीपैरा यंत्र से संबंध स्थापित करने में असमर्थ
मल्टी पैरा डिवाइस से कनेक्शन टूट गया
रिकॉर्डिंग के लिए फ़ाइल को खोल नहीं सका!
रिकॉर्ड फाइल बंद नहीं किया जा सकता है!

ECG गाइड

 This device comes along with four ECG sensors namely Ag/AgCl electrodes. Connect these four electrodes to the probe and gently stick them on to your limbs, placements are shown above. On the front panel,
 press the “Start” button once to turn the ECG on.
 

Do not carry any activity after placing electrodes, just sit relax and observe your ECG.

SPO2 Guide

Open the clamp of the Pulse Oximeter PO3, then place your middle, ring or index finger of your left hand into the opening of the oximeter with nail side down, as pictured.
 On the front panel, press the “Start” button once to turn the oximeter on.

NIBP Guide

 The patient should sit or lie comfortably. The arm should be fully supported on a flat surface at heart level. When seated, the patient should have their back and arm supported, and their legs should not be crossed. 
 The patient should relax prior to measurement comfortably for five (5) minutes, and should refrain from talking or moving during measurement.

 The bottom edge of the cuff should be positioned approximately one inch (2-3cm) above the antecubital fold. Wrap the end of the cuff not containing the bladder around the arm snugly, and smoothly and engage adhesive strips. To verify a correct fit, check that the Index Line falls between the two Range Lines.

Temperature Guide

 Place the sensor at optimum position i.e. 2 cm at 15 degree from the body. Accuracy of our basal body thermometer is 0.1 degree at optimum position, it will vary with the distance of the probe. The distance may vary the accuracy as large as 0.5 degree.
ईमेल भेजने के लिए खाली जगहो को पूर्ण करें
